modName: In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread
summary: I simply reduced the amount of gold earned by chopping wood and mining ore, when sold to  lumber-mills and mines. Choose your rate : 2/5, 3/5 or 4/5 !
descriptionHtml:
Don\'t you find it strange that professionals would buy without making a profit ?
The mine and lumber-mill owners buy your wares at full price !
Surely, communists AND capitalists must see an oddity here. xD
Now it\'s fixed for better immersion (really simple mod).
Tough, surely I am not the first tweaking this. This is my first mod.
But I want to expand it to inns, carriages, etc, and allow personalization.
I really want to find how to change the rate-messages in Inns. I haven\'t tried carriages yet,
but you can find mods that do it, even if they don\'t offer choices. 

----------------
Installation
----------------
Just put ONE of the .esp files in your Data folder. Ta-daaaa !
author: Seckham
